item.title: Munich Re announces buybacks even after saying it expects $1.2 billion in claims from California fires
item.description: Shares of Munich Re climbed on Wednesday after the German reinsurer stuck to its outlook, despite announcing hefty expected claims from California wil...

item.title: Investors love Buffett and then ignore what he says. How to avoid these mistakes made in 2024.
item.description: Larry Swedroe, author of several investing books, talks about the biggest mistakes investors make year after year, and how they can break the cycle.

item.title: Advance Auto Parts’ stock skids as retailer predicts weak sales next quarter
item.description: Advance is also in the middle of a restructuring plan that will result in the closing of 500 stores.

item.title: ‘I’m an endless honey pot’: My wife and I are in our 70s. We gave our son $40,000 for his L.A. wedding. Now he wants more.
item.description: “We have four sons. We financed three of them through college, so none of our kids have student loans.”
